content:
Archineer Associates Co.,Ltd. is a multi-disciplines consulting service firm that provides Architectural and Engineering design and consulting services to clients across an expansive range of markets and localities. Our multi-disciplinary services; Architecture, Civil & Structural Engineering, Mechanical; Electrical Engineering, Land Surveying and Planning; join forces, knowledge and experience to give you a single point of contact and a strong business relationship you can count on. Our office is located at Saphangmor Village, Saysetha District, Vientiane Capital, Lao PDR where we have started doing business.

We are currently seeking the following positions:

Project Manager / Coordinator
Responsibilities



Requirements
